text: Halldór Ásgrímsson (8 September 1947 - 18 May 2015) was the Prime Minister of Iceland. He became the leader of the Progressive Party in 1994. On September 15, 2004, he took over as Prime Minister from the Independence Party leader, Davíð Oddsson. He resigned in 2009. Halldór died from a heart attack at a Reykjavik hospital, aged 67. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Prime ministers of Iceland
title: Halldór Ásgrímsson
